name: Renard Run
description:
'Renard Run' is an infinite runner where you guide our intrepid fox, Renard, through the outskirts of a village and try to avoid patrols.

Use any button to make Renard crouch. If you're hiding behind something the guards won't see you. Stay alive for as long as you can and see if you can beat the highscores.

Credits

Made by Flippant Kea Games

  • Fox sprite: [Sunny Land - Ansimuz] http://ansimuz.com/site/portfolio/sunny-land/
  • Background: [Pixel Art Forest - Eder Muniz] https://edermunizz.itch.io/pixel-art-forest
  • Scenery: [Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props - Cainos] https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-platformer-village-props
  • Enemies: [Jungle Asset Pack - Jesse Munguia] https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack
  • MUSIC: [8-bit music free - Cron Audio] https://soundcloud.com/cron-audio
  • SFX: [Free Casual Game Sound - Dustyroom] https://dustyroom.com/free-casual-game-sounds/
  • FONT: [Humble Fonts - Gold - somepx] https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold
